column4: hey, I just installed ubuntu feisty the and I wanted to add a simple LAMP server to test my projects but none of it seems to be included, is there a simple way of doing this without installing the server version?
You don't have to install the server version for any server servicese. :) Should all be in Synaptic.
hmm I couldnt seem to find but I'll look again
Did you enable the third party respotoires ?
all the official repositories are enabled
Are you trying to install apache?
from the cmd line if you put in apt-get install apache
You are suppose to do it via Synaptic
